Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Femininity \Fem`i*nin"i*ty\, n. 1. The quality or nature of the female sex; womanliness. [1913 Webster]
2. The female form. [Obs.] [1913 Webster]
O serpent under femininitee. --Chaucer. [1913 Webster]
femininity n : the trait of behaving in ways considered typical for women [syn: {muliebrity}] [ant: {masculinity}]
